name: Twitch - LuciD V.2   *** Old layout is BACK! ***
description:
Since Twitch changed everything I decided to make a new layout based on the old style with some plus changes. Enjoy!
* Fix Dark Theme colors.
* Fix Font Style.
* The video at Homepage is gone (nope, not possible to turn it off completely).. 
* Theater Mode icon is gone, u just need to click at the video screen to enable it (it shows a different cursor now).
* Clip icon is now black and at a new position (I used to click on it accidentally all the time).
* Video Overlays are gone (and some color changes).
* Everyone in Chat is RED (and some small letter spacing).
* Top bar redone, more clean and Prime/Bits icons are gone.
* Whispers icon is invisible, but don't worry, it still there, try it out!
* Top Cheerers Bar over the chat is invisible as well.
* Video Previews are bigger (Categories).

Eventually I add some changes so remember to update the Style and... FoLLoW Me On TwItCh LikE ComMeNt SuBsCriBe >>> Twitch.tv/Dsiq

discussions.name: The additions should be optional. Red nicknames thing is obnoxious.
